mapper.select: select no,title,to_char(sdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd AM HH:MI:SS') sdate, sender, receiver, to_char(rdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd AM hh:mi:ss') rdate from message order by no desc

select count(no) from message
where #{searchKey} like '%#{searchWord}%'
mapper.insert: insert into message(no, title, content, sender, receiver) values(message_seq.nextval,#{title},#{content},#{sender},#{receiver})
mapper.select: select no, title, content, to_char(sdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd AM hh:mi:ss') sdate, sender, receiver, to_char(rdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd AM hh:mi:ss') rdate from message where no=#{no}
mapper.update: update message set rdate=#{rdate} where no=#{no}
